statements: DELETE FROM refugees WHERE id = 1 AND country_of_origin = 'Syria';
DELETE FROM refugees WHERE support_needed = TRUE AND (resettlement_status = 'Pending' OR refugee_status = 'Pending');
DELETE FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE support_received = FALSE;
DELETE FROM refugees_rights WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria' AND refugee_status = true;
DELETE FROM support_services WHERE service_name = 'Medical Care';
DELETE FROM support_services WHERE service_name = 'Housing Assistance';
DELETE FROM support WHERE type = 'financial' AND description LIKE '%urgent%'
